Darkfate:

"We have several things to discuss and outside isn't a good place" 
said the male "If Megaton is agree, we can discuss the news and a 
possible alliance in conference roon"

with a Darkfate's signal, the others members of Blackfortress came in 
base and disappear. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton watched the entire group. he didn't like being outnumbered 
but knew
> that all he had to do was fly into the lava to escape. He heard 
Drillbits
> response about taking a chance. "You are wise to do so."he said, his
> artificial respect being hidden by his robotic smile.
> 
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Killfest rounds a corner, seeing Megaton and the bots gathered 
around
> him. He smiles to himself. Ever since arriving at this planet,
> Killfest hadn't seen a bot as tall as himself, untill now. Killfest
> approaches Megaton, looking at him at eye level.
> 
> Megaton maintains eye contact until Killfest looks away. "It is a 
pleasure
> to meet the dignified Killfest, Megatrons files list you in high 
regard."
> the files listed Killfest as a priority target but in Predacon 
standards it
> was high regard.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Friday, February 16, 2001 4:17 AM
> Subject: Predacon destruction
> 
> 
> > ::Drillbit::
> >
> > He thought about what Megaton had said.
> > "I'm willing to give it a chance. DarkFate?"
> >
> >
> >
> >
